name: Lori Becherer
bio: Lori Becherer is an artist, photographer, poet, and member of the Heartland Women’s Writers Guild. She has received numerous awards for her poetry and photography. Much of her work is inspired by nature’s beauty and fury. Her poetry and essays have been published in Cantos, Penumbra, lipstik, Sugar Mule and Switched-on Gutenberg. She lives in Millstadt, Illinois.
